# 遁甲三书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/dunjia-sanshu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/dunjia-sanshu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install dunjia-sanshu
dunjia-sanshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g dunjia-sanshu
dunjia-sanshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
